artist: Painter: After Godfried Schalcken; Engraver: Thomas A. E. Chambars
description: 3/4 length portrait; elbow on plinth; holding candle in right hand and cloak to chest with left hand; fluted column left background; wearing white shirt, long curly wig, coat with buttons with tassels
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

Above image right corner in black: P.378 | Below image in black: Ipse pinx.   T. Chambars sculp / GODFREY SCHALCKEN | on sheet in pencil: 2-372 / on top of mount in pencil:372  2
title: Portrait of Godfrey Schalcken
